name: Astro (itch) (McLyntree)
description:
Welcome to the world of Astro! From talking sticks to moon-worshipping hares, you'll never know what you'll find in this wacky 2D game!

Current Version - 0.1.3

0.1.3 already? What happened to 0.1.0, 0.1.1, and 0.1.2?

Good question. Through the development of Astro, we had 2 different versions. They weren't so good, so we created a third version. This is the one you see now. (It's a less than average answer, but it's true.) 

[We also consider coming up with the ideas as a version, we don't know why either.]

(Note: Game is in such an early state, you might as well give this game a new development state known as "This isn't even a game yet." Everything is subject to change, and this game may or may not be worked on. It depends on how well it goes. Nonetheless, we hope you enjoy it.)
